content:
Welcome to the beautiful town of Mundania, where the flowers are pretty, the trees are tall, and the people may or may not be out to kill you and take away everything you love.

There’s been a recent spree of crime and killings in this formerly quiet town, and you folk are (quite frankly) fed up with it. You’ve all decided to gather in the town square, and kill each other off day by day (using logic and reason, of course). The idea is that you’ll eventually rid the town of the mafiosos, and you’ll know when you do, because the Mundania Oversight Deity (MOD) will tell you so. Don’t ask how these things work; just trust that they do.

Will the honest citizens of Mundania succeed in their seemingly-insane plan to clean up the town? Or will the mafia prevail, and turn Mundania into a hellish slum of crime and filth? Only time will tell…

RULES:


General:

1)
I am MOD. There is no greater authority than I. I reserve the right to alter these rules if I deem it necessary, including retroactively enforcing new/altered rules. You also have my promise that I will not do so unless it really is necessary.
2)
Do not talk about this game outside of the thread (or your QT, if you have one) in any way, shape, or form.
3)
Do not quote any mod communications. You may paraphrase, but be cautious when doing so.
4)
If you are modkilled, you automatically become a Neutral Survivor, and lose the game.
5)
If I screw up, let me know. Post in thread (
@Mod: I voted for Nader, not Bush
) or PM me.
6)
Please try to avoid using
bold
unless you are voting or communicating with me.
7)
All night actions will be resolved with Natural Action Resolution.
8)
Purple is my color. Do not use it.

9)
All roles have been given out by Random.org.

Voting/Lynching:

1)
Voting will be done either using the VOTE: tag, or in this format:
vote: Nixon
.
2)
There will be no voting trickery. If something is clearly intended to be a vote for a specific player, I will treat it as such.
3)
A lynch will occur when half-plus-one of living players are voting for the same player. As soon as the hammer vote is cast, the game will enter Twilight.
4)
All living players (including the lynchee) may talk in Twilight, but any voting/unvoting will not count. Twilight will last until I post the final vote count / scene.
5)
Roles will be revealed at death.
6)
Once dead, you are allowed a single ‘bah’ post at the beginning of the next Day Phase. This post must be made within 48 hours of the beginning of the Day, and cannot contain any game information.
7)
If there is no majority at deadline, the player with the highest number of votes will be lynched. Anyone not voting will be counted as voting for no-lynch. If two or more players are tied for the most votes, there will be a no-lynch.

Deadlines:

1)
Day phases will have a deadline of 2 weeks from the daybreak scene.
2)
Day phases are extendable in the case of excessive/badly timed replacements, or if two-thirds of living players request an extension. Extensions will be granted in 3-day increments, unless otherwise noted.
3)
Night phases will have an unalterable deadline of 3 days from the lynch scene.
4)
Prods will be given if a player has not posted in 48 hours.
5)
A player must respond, in-thread, to a prod within 24 hours, or they will be replaced. If the 24 hours runs into Night Phase, they must PM me within the same time frame.

Don’t Be Stupid:

1)
Don’t use hidden or encrypted text. You may use small text, unless it is hiding game-related or important information.
2)
Play to your win condition.
3)
Don’t attack your fellow players. It’s just a game.
4)
Understand that life throws curveballs sometimes, and players will have to go V/LA. I can certainly relate. Please do not accuse players of using V/LA unfairly.
5)
By the same token, please don’t use V/LA unfairly. If something comes up, that’s fine, but don’t ruin the game for others. Request replacement if you need to.
6)
Have fun. No, really. Have fun.
